text:
Calling Project.setProperty(String, String) to set a (new) property on a Project
only has an effect the first time it is called. Subsequent calls do not set the
property to a new value.
creator: ken.carroll@activesky.com
ken.carroll@activesky.com
text:
KC: After looking at verbose output and the source it appears that the property
IS being set, but the change is not picked up by the <target>.

creator: ken.carroll@activesky.com
text: KC. Sorry this is NOT a bug. My error.
